title.rendered: Samsung Galaxy XCover 4s Enterprise Edition 32 GB Dual-SIM Android Smartphone – Black (UK Version)

content.rendered:
The Samsung Galaxy Xcover 4s blends sturdiness and design for a tough-working enterprise telephone which stands as much as probably the most excessive work environments. IP68 water and dirt resistant, elevated contact sensitivity ensures you possibly can work in robust circumstances with out having to take away protecting gloves. Built-in Samsung Knox defence-grade safety retains your telephone and enterprise information protected whereas a robust interchangeable battery retains you going, regardless of the place your work takes you.
